component_summary.name: Card
component_summary.description: Simple, styled card primitives that provide consistent container, header, title, description, content and footer slots. Intended as a lightweight layout/building block for dashboard or panel UIs.

components.name: Card
components.description: Root container that applies border, background and rounded styling.

components.name: CardHeader
components.description: Header area with padding and vertical spacing.

components.name: CardDescription
components.description: Smaller descriptive text used under title.

notes: Presentation-only; styling uses the shared `cn` helper.
Low duplication risk; follows project pattern of tiny, focused UI primitives.
Good candidate for reuse across pages; no business logic to centralize.
